Module uno_game
Package game_model

Class UserInfo

java.lang.Object
game_model.UserInfo
public class UserInfo extends Object
The UserInfo class represents a user in the game, managing the user's nickname, password, wins, losses, total score, total games, and rank.

  • Constructor Summary

      public UserInfo(String nickname, String password, int wins, int losses, int totalScore, int totalGames)
      Constructs a new UserInfo object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the user's nickname
      password - the user's password
      wins - the number of wins the user has
      losses - the number of losses the user has
      totalScore - the total score the user has accumulated
      totalGames - the total number of games the user has played
